text: Zisas Krais khueŋ vuzvugi, kha gumgi gu mbigi zam tuituigip khueŋ kaŋgirga, ana tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, ana guigira mbarara mbe nzuai guma ma. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap fharav nan kora muuŋgi. Mba gumgi gu mbigi ana na muuŋgi tɨva gangip, mbe ana khothɨgɨrga, ana zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn mben nɨɨŋgirga.
